summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GastroCore Sprint 1 features including authentication, RBAC, areas management, users management, reservations workflow, audit logging, and service terminal functionality. All core features are working correctly with proper German localization and beige/green theme.

resolved_issues.issue: Admin login credentials were changed during previous testing
resolved_issues.resolution: Reset admin password in database to original test credentials
resolved_issues.impact: No longer blocking admin functionality tests

resolved_issues.issue: Reservation status change API endpoint format
resolved_issues.resolution: Fixed test to use query parameter format instead of request body

resolved_issues.issue: Mitarbeiter users were redirected to dashboard instead of no-access page
resolved_issues.resolution: Modified ProtectedRoute to redirect mitarbeiter role to /no-access for restricted routes

passed_tests: Backend API authentication for all user roles
Password change requirement on first login
Reservation status transitions (neu → bestätigt → angekommen → abgeschlossen)
Admin access to all management pages
Schichtleiter access to service terminal and reservations
Mitarbeiter access restriction to no-access page
Service terminal UI with reservations display
JWT authentication with proper token handling
Password change flow for all user types

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - 1 minor RBAC fix applied)
